cause.description:
The Olevolos Project is a registered 501(c)3 non-profit based in the United States and with a branch in Tanzania. We are currently building a nursery school in the Olevolos Village and hope to welcome our first class in January of 2010.
Please visit our website for more information:
www.theolevolosproject.org
1. All children should have the opportunities and facilities, by law and by other means, to enable him/her to develop physically, mentally, morally, spir
2. All children are entitled to grow and develop with adequate nutrition, housing, recreation and medical services.
3. A child who is physically, mentally, or socially handicapped shall be given the special treatment, education, and care required by his/her particular
4. All children are entitled to receive education, which will enable him/her to become a useful member of society.
cause.mission: "Enabling children from Olevolos to grow up in a safe, secure, and supportive home environment and encouraging them to become active and contributing members of their local and global communities"
cause.name: The Olevolos Project
